text: Ivica Burić (; born 5 April 1963) is a Croatian professional basketball coach and former player. He is best known for winning the FIBA European Champions Cup in 1989. ==References== *http://sportnetmanager.com/coaches- details.php?id=39 Category:Living people Category:1963 births Category:Apollon Patras B.C. coaches Category:Croatian basketball coaches Category:Croatian men's basketball players Category:KK Split coaches Category:KK Split players Category:KK Šibenik players Category:KK Zadar coaches Category:Sportspeople from Split, Croatia
title: Ivica Burić
